DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Global Health Version 1.2 Global10r In The Past 7 Days How Often Have You Been Bothered By Emotional Problems Such As Feeling Anxious Depressed Or Irritable Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation in the past 7 days about how often they have been bothered by emotional problems such as feeling anxious, depressed or irritable, using a five-point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Adult Global Health Domain In The Past 7 Days How Often Have You Been Bothered By Emotional Problems Such As Feeling Anxious Depressed Or Irritable Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains._A question about an individual's assessment of how often they have been bothered by emotional problems in the past seven days._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains.

Concepts.definition: A Patient Reported Outcomes Measurement Information System (PROMIS) domain that assesses overall health in general, including global ratings of the five primary PROMIS domains (physical function, fatigue, pain, emotional distress, social health) as well as perceptions of general health that cut across domains.

Concepts.longName: In The Past 7 Days How Often Have You Been Bothered By Emotional Problems Such As Feeling Anxious Depressed Or Irritable
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's assessment of how often they have been bothered by emotional problems in the past seven days.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG Study in Rave per request by D.Grant. mc 6/14/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used with the PROMIS items that describes a range of subjective scores for representing how often an individual experiences something from 5: Never, to 1: Always.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

Concepts.definition: Not ever; at no time in the past (or future).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Added "Sometimes" to represent the MSAS value domain.ghd.01.27.15

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer that something occurs frequently.

Concepts.definition: On many occasions, or in many situations.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: At all times; on every occasion.

Concepts.definition: At all times; on every occasion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

Concepts.definition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
